TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SqlCeProviderServices extends System.Data.Entity.Core.Common.DbProviderServices
Public NotInheritable Class SqlCeProviderServices Inherits DbProviderServices

Docs.summary: The ProviderServices object for the Sql CE provider
Docs.remarks: Note that instance of this type also resolves additional provider services for Microsoft SQL Server Compact Edition when this type is registered as an EF provider either using an entry in the application's config file or through code-based registration in . The services resolved are: Requests for are resolved to a Singleton instance of to create connections to SQL Compact by default. Requests for for the invariant name "System.Data.SqlServerCe.4.0" are resolved to instances to provide default Migrations SQL generation for SQL Compact.

Docs.summary: API for creating the databse and schema objects given a StoreItemCollection. This will do following things: 1. Create a new database using SqlCeEngine.CreateDatabase(). 2. Generate scripts for creating schema objects. 3. Execute the scrip generated in step2.

Docs.summary: API for checkin whether database exists or not. This will internally only check whether the file that the connection points to exists or not. Note: In case of SQLCE, timeout and storeItemCollection parameters are ignored.
Docs.returns: Bool indicating whether database exists or not.

Docs.summary: This is the well-known string using in configuration files and code-based configuration as the "provider invariant name" used to specify Microsoft SQL Server Compact Edition 4.0 for ADO.NET and Entity Framework provider services.
